body: Added support for ROW_NUMBER as window function
Allow to specify the data source when searching for the upgrade path
Add support for EXCEPT set operator and DB-link
Additional validation on Oracle primary key names
Fix Oracle PARALLEL query hint syntax.

- Fix for error in the previous release (1.7.2) around NUL handling
- Fix for UNION in parentheses for MySQL (see https://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=21614 )

- Fix for NUL characters
- Additional tests for indexes

- Fix to view rebuild/creation 
- Fix to Graph Based Upgrade preparation
New feature (backwards-compatible) : Support for Graph Based Upgrade execution
Adds an extension to view deployment validation
Hotfix release on the 1.3.4 branch to add changes to the deployed views
Add a missing method to drop all views
Fix to increase the default H2 lock timeout
Upgrade Mockito to 1.3.9
Fix to the previous release, to split view definitions.

NOTICE : This release is invalid, and has been marked as 'pre-release' to indicate this. Suggest using 1.6.4 instead,

Emergency release: Allow large view definitions to be written to the DeployedViews table in Oracle

New feature : add support for oracle custom hints to select queries
New feature : persist view definitions
Fix for blob support

New feature - Add support for degree of parallelism in parallel query hint with
Experimental feature - support for BLOB literals
Provides the ability to supply a custom hint to select query as a hotfix to the 1.2.9 branch
New feature: Direct path insert hint for insert statements over Oracle
Hot fix - allow schema adaptation to work where the same indexes are present on different tables

Maintenance release:
- improved testing (TestSqlNulls) - #162 
- code cleanup, making Sonar happier - #158
- drop dependency on (empty) guice-multibindings - #163
Hot fix - allow schema adaptation to work where the same indexes are present on different tables
Hot fix - allow schema adaptation to work where the same indexes are present on different tables

Addressing some PostgreSQL temp table and transaction issues
More dialect testing
Minor fixes for random strings on Postgres and unicode on Oracle
Revert the change from nvl to coalesce
Improve reliability of a unit test
Mock dialect tidy-up
More DSL fixes and additions
DSL fixes
Fixing Oracle's behaviour when dropping DEFAULT clauses

This release jumps the public versioning up to 1.x

From now on we'll attempt to use SemVer.

name: 1.0.0-rc1
